description:
Suffering an injury in an automobile accident is devastating. From our office location in Rockford, Illinois, our attorneys at The Law Offices of Frederick W. Nessler and Associates, Ltd., aggressively advocate on behalf of people and families who have been injured due to another’s careless or negligent actions. We offer free initial consultations and work to maintain open lines of communication with you throughout the legal process so you are aware of your options and the status of your claim.

 

Focusing our practice on personal injury, our law offices have experience handling cases involving a range of matters, including the following: drunk driving injuries, texting while driving car accidents, trucking accidents, uninsured drivers, products liability, workers’ compensation, mesothelioma and asbestos, clergy abuse, institutional sexual abuse, nursing home neglect and medical malpractice. We use our knowledge to look at all of the evidence in your case and hold our own investigation. Our goal is to leave no stone unturned in seeking justice for you. 

 

When it comes to obtaining financial recoveries, the insurance company or liable person may refuse to pay you what you deserve. For more than 35 years, we have dedicated ourselves to serving clients throughout the Rockford, Chicago, Springfield, Decatur, Lincoln and Champaign, Illinois, areas, as well as in Denver, Colorado. Our attorneys at The Law Offices of Frederick W. Nessler and Associates, Ltd., make every effort to negotiate a fair settlement on your behalf that takes your pain and suffering, lost wages, medical expenses and other losses into account. However, if the responsible party is unwilling to offer a reasonable figure, we are prepared to take your claim to trial.
